Magic
Spell Slots: S0: 9; S1: 7; S2: 7; S3: 7; S4: 6; S5: 6; S6: 6; S7: 6; S8: 6; S9: 6; Stormborn1: 1; Stormborn2: 1; Stormborn3: 1; Stormborn4: 1; Stormborn5: 1; Stormborn6: 1; Stormborn7: 1; Stormborn8: 1; Stormborn9: 1 Spell DC: S: 13; Stormborn: 13
Spells:
Chain Lightning (Stormborn6 Evoc): R1200' Bolt inflicts 20d6 HP to primary target (DC 19 Ref half) and 20 secondary targets in 30' radius (DC 19 Ref +2 half)
Control Weather (Stormborn7 Tran): Modifies seasonal weather in 2 mile radius for 4d12 hr
Gust Of Wind (Stormborn2 Evoc): 60' 50 MPH gust affects medium or smaller creatures (DC 15 Fort neg) for 1 rd
Lightning Bolt (Stormborn3 Evoc): 120' bolt inflicts 10d6 HP (DC 16 Ref half)
Overland Flight (Stormborn5 Tran): Self gains 40' fly speed and +10 Fly skill for 20 hr
Shocking Grasp (Stormborn1 Evoc): Touch (+3 vs. metal) inflicts 5d6 HP
Shout (Stormborn4 Evoc): R30' Cone inflicts 5d6 HP and deafness for 2d6 rd (DC 17 Fort half damage, no deafness)
Storm Of Vengeance (Stormborn9 Conj): R1200' 360' radius storm deafens for 1d4x10 min (DC 22 Fort neg), then rains acid inflicting 1d6 HP, then generates 6 bolts lightning that inflict 10d6 HP each (DC 22 Ref half), then hail that inflicts 5d6 HP, then obscures vision for 6 rd
Whirlwind (Stormborn8 Evoc): R1200' Wind in 10' radius inflicts 3d6 HP, then 1d8 HP/rd for 20 rd (DC 21 Ref neg)
Magic Notes:
Charisma Sorcerer Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level S1, S2, S3
Spell Focus (Necromancy): +1 Spell DC (Necromancy)
Bloodline Stormborn: +1 save DC on electricity and sonic spells
Craft Wand: May create wands for up to 4th level spell
Ectoplasmic Spell: May cast spell targeting incorporeal or ethereal target; uses +1 spell slot
Elemental Spell (Acid): May convert half or all spell damage to acid damage; uses +1 spell slot
Eschew Materials: May cast spells w/out materials
Expanded Arcana: +1 spells known, or +2 of lower than max level
Ride The Lightning: Full-round action moves self 300' w/out provoking AOO, inflicts Thunderbolt effect for 20 rd 1/dy
Thunderbolt: R120' 5' radius inflicts 20d6 HP (half electricity, half sonic) and deafened 1 rd (DC 23 Ref half HP only) 3/dy
Thundering Spell: Target damaged by spell becomes deafened (spell save or Fort neg) for spell level rd; uses +2 spell slot
Thunderstaff: Touched weapon inflicts +1d6 HP electricity for 10 rd or gains shocking burst property for 5 rd 6/dy
